<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Simple wrapper around std::function&lt;void(raw&#95;ostream&amp;)&gt;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class is useful to construct print helpers for raw&#95;ostream.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     Printable printRegister(unsigned Register) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       return Printable(&#91;Register&#93;(raw&#95;ostream &amp;OS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         OS &lt;&lt; getRegisterName(Register);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     ... OS &lt;&lt; printRegister(Register); ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Implementation note: Ideally this would just be a typedef, but doing so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// leads to operator &lt;&lt; being ambiguous as function has matching constructors</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// in some STL versions. I have seen the problem on gcc 4.6 libstdc++ and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// microsoft STL.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/printable"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/printable/#a249eb6b998536519ef6f7e363931e4d0">Printable</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
